did.unittitle: William T. Withers incoming correspondence from James K. Patterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Letters from James K. Patterson regarding a joint Kentucky Univerisity-A&M College payment contract for carpenters and janitors at Woodlands, including specifically James. M. Moore (18787 Nov. 4); and regarding requested repairs (1879 Aug. 18).
